issue.title: [Dev] merge_arrow_pr.py depends on six
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12775](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12775). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is causing Source Release and Merge Script CI to fail because it used to get six transitively, but a dependency updated and now we don't get  it.
